column1: Vardamir means "Jewel of [[Varda]]" in [[Quenya]] (from ''mírë'' "jewel"). His surname, Nólimon, means "Man of Knowledge" (from ''nólë'' "lore, knowledge" and ''-mon'', a masculine suffix) or "most learned". It was given as a surname to [[Elros]]' son Vardamir because of his great love of ancient lore and knowledge, which he collected from many sources.<ref name="Index">{{UT
column2: Index}}</ref> Like all the rulers of Númenor who took royal titles in Quenya, Vardamir added the prefix ''tar-'' ("high") to his name when he received the Sceptre.
